abstract: Lily, a 7-year-old girl, is meant to represent one of the 17 million American children that the Department of Agriculture estimates has limited or uncertain access to food.
snippet: Lily, a 7-year-old girl, is meant to represent one of the 17 million American children that the Department of Agriculture estimates has limited or uncertain access to food.

headline.main: 'Sesame Street' Special on Hunger Introduces New Muppet Character
headline.print_headline: New Muppet Created For Hunger Awareness
